001package com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.WalletEvents;
002
003import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.client.service.model.Challenge;
004import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.errors.WalletException;
005import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.WalletMessage.credential.CredentialMessage;
006
007public class WalletError implements WalletEvent {
008    public static WalletEventType TYPE = WalletEventType.ERROR;
009
010    public String sender;
011    public Challenge challenge;
012
013    WalletException walletException;
014
015    public WalletError(String sender, WalletException error){
016        this.sender = sender;
017        this.walletException = error;
018    }
019
020    @Override
021    public WalletEventType getType() {
022        return TYPE;
023    }
024
025    @Override
026    public String getSender() {
027        return sender;
028    }
029
030    @Override
031    public Challenge getChallenge() {
032        return challenge;
033    }
034
035    public WalletException getError(){
036        return  walletException;
037    }
038}
